resources.string: This game is a blackjack variant that provides the player with power-ups to balance against the implicit edge of the dealer. An explanation of each power-up can be found in the "How to Play" section. I hope you have fun playing the game!

Most code in this app is original work, and the rest is adapted from Stack Overflow links or the Android docs. All artwork in this app, except the app icon, is used without modification with either explicit permission or a Creative Commons license. The app icon is adapted from one of the images below.
